code: import axios from'../config/axios';export var setCategories=function setCategories(categories){return{type:'SET_CATEGORIES',payload:categories};};export var startSetCategories=function startSetCategories(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/categories').then(function(response){var categories=response.data;if(Array.isArray(categories)){dispatch(setCategories(categories));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};var addCategory=function addCategory(category){return{type:'ADD_CATEGORY',payload:category};};export var startAddCategory=function startAddCategory(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/categories',formData).then(function(response){if(typeof response.data==='object'){dispatch(addCategory(response.data));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};
